title: GR Customizable Anime Character 01
description: High quality customizable anime character. Compatible with Epic's skeleton and bundled with cloth sets, items, 3rd person template and animations from Epic. Component based system for easy implementation in any kind of project
longDescription:
High quality customizable anime character, ready to be implemented on your game. Compatible with Epic's skeleton and bundled with cloth sets, items, 3rd person template and animations from Epic. It can be customized on the editor or during gameplay.

Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=69ttp66aIj0
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Customize character for male, female, fat, breast size, facial features and much more!
  • 17 Cloth Parts
  • 4 Hair
  • 13 Eyes
  • 7 Eyebrows
  • 3 Accessories
  • Powerful customization component for easy implementation in any kind of project. (Made entirely in Blueprints)
  • Library of eyes, clothes, hair and accessories.
  • Compatible with epic skeleton.
  • Includes Widget Blueprint for in-game customization.
  • Post process included to simulate anime outlines and shading.


Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

Animated: Yes

Number of characters: 1 (Customizable)

Vertex counts of characters: ~35k

Texture Resolutions: ~2048

Number of Animations: 69 (Epic default animations + Epic Animation Starter Pack)

Animation types: In-place

Supported Development Platforms: PC,Console

Supported Target Build Platforms: PC,Console

Documentation:

Important/Additional Notes:
